Language barriers: In some countries, people may not speak the same language as the campaign organizers, making it challenging to communicate effectively and raise funds.
Political instability: In some regions, political instability could make it difficult to hold fundraising events or collect donations.
Limited resources: In some countries, there may be limited resources available to support cancer research, making it challenging to raise funds.
Different levels of awareness: People in different countries may have different levels of awareness about cancer and its causes, which could impact the success of the fundraising campaign.
Different levels of support: In some countries, there may be different levels of support for cancer research, which could impact the amount of funds raised.
